observation: Independent Investment Bank | Matrix Capital Markets Group  News Insights Contact Us JOIN OUR EMAIL LIST Our Firm Overview Careers Our Team Advisory Services Mergers & Acquisitions Capital Advisory Valuation Advisory Industries Automotive Aftermarket Downstream Energy & Convenience Retail Healthcare Outdoor Recreation & Marine Business Services Consumer Diversified Industrials Restaurants Transportation & Logistics Transactions Search trusted guidance, exceptional results We are an independent, privately-held investment bank. Our deep team of experienced investment bankers provide thoughtful, unbiased merger & acquisition, capital raising, valuation, and financial advisory services to privately-held businesses, publicly traded corporations, and capital providers. We are proud to have successfully advised hundreds of clients over the past 35+ years on some of their most impactful business decisions. Matrix’s merger and acquisition services include: Company sales and recapitalizations, corporate carve-outs, special situations, management buyouts, buy-side representation and not-for-profit transactions. Matrix can help public, private, and not-for-profit clients navigate the increasingly complex capital markets landscape when contemplating events ranging from refinance strategies to complete recapitalizations and everything in between. Matrix provides business valuation services to companies and their underlying securities – including common equity, partnership and limited liability company interests, convertible and preferred securities, options, warrants, and debt instruments. Recent Transactions Explore our recent transactions and see how we’ve helped hundreds of clients across a wide range of industries. 1 2 3 Previous Next View all transactions We are delighted to transact with H&S Energy as the new steward of our enterprise. Our companies share similar stories, starting with single sites, then growing into formidable players in our industry.  This transaction will be a win for all stakeholders.  We especially appreciate the great work of Matrix in assisting us with finding the perfect buyer and perfect transaction. M.J. Castelo, Andretti Petroleum Group Our Industry Expertise No two industries are the same and our services are not one-size-fits-all. The Matrix team brings years of experience to the table, helping our clients navigate the nuances specific to their industry. Dedicated Sector Advisory Team members in our Dedicated Sector Advisory Groups focus exclusively Broad Sector Advisory Broad Sector team members have developed transaction-specific expertise that benefits clients across multiple industries Put our expertise to work for you. CONTACT US RICHMOND, VA (HQ) 800 East Canal Street 804.780.0060 BALTIMORE, MD 400 East Pratt Street 410.752.3833 NEW YORK, NY Rockefeller Center 667.217.3316 © 2024 Matrix Capital Markets Group, Inc. | All Rights Reserved | Privacy Policy Matrix BCP Disclosure Statement Matrix Capital Markets Group, Inc. is registered as a municipal advisor with the Securities and Exchange Commission and with the MSRB Securities offered by MCMG Capital Advisors, Inc., an affiliate of Matrix Capital Markets Group, Inc., Member FINRA & SIPC Join Mailing List First and Last Name * Email Address Company Name Comments/Questions Comments This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
